page.title: 20TRANSPORT
page.content: There are three regular bus routes in our area: the Newport to Ventnor service and the Cowes to Shanklin and Ventnor service in square 4, the Newport to Brighstone Post Bus in squares 2,6,5 and the Ryde to Ventnor and Blackgang service in squares 1,5 and 9. Some of the minor roads are too narrow for buses . Elderly people in the remote parts, who are not active enough to walk to the nearest bus routes, have to depend on private transport. There are no railways. All the roads are in a good state of repair. There are a few overtaking areas along the minor roads which car drivers hope are near when they meet oncoming traffic! Road users have to be very alert on these narrow, country roads.
